tdd_description: Technical design for payment integration covering provider abstraction layer, secure token vault, webhook processing, and PCI-DSS compliance architecture. The design implements a pluggable provider system allowing easy addition of new payment processors.
design_decisions: Use provider adapter pattern for payment abstraction; Implement token vault with AES-256 encryption; Use Kafka for async webhook processing; Redis for caching payment sessions; Circuit breaker pattern for provider failover
security_considerations: PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance required; All card data must be tokenized; TLS 1.3 for all communications; HSM for key management
performance_requirements: Sub-100ms payment initiation; 99.99% uptime SLA; Support 1000 TPS peak load

tdd_description: Comprehensive technical design for authentication service including OAuth 2.0 authorization server, JWT lifecycle management, MFA providers integration, and RBAC policy engine. Supports federated identity with external IdPs.
design_decisions: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow with PKCE; Use RS256 for JWT signing; Redis for token blacklisting; Keycloak as identity provider; TOTP for MFA; Implement refresh token rotation
security_considerations: OWASP Top 10 compliance; Brute force protection; Rate limiting on auth endpoints; Secure session management; Password hashing with Argon2
performance_requirements: Token validation under 10ms; Support 5000 concurrent sessions; Auth flow completion under 500ms

tdd_description: Technical design for order management covering event-driven order processing, real-time inventory synchronization, intelligent order routing, and carrier API integrations. Implements CQRS for read/write separation.
design_decisions: Event sourcing for order state management; RabbitMQ for async processing; MongoDB for flexible order schema; Elasticsearch for order search; Saga pattern for distributed transactions; CQRS for query optimization
security_considerations: Data encryption at rest; Audit logging for all state changes; API authentication via JWT; Input validation on all endpoints
performance_requirements: Order creation under 200ms; Support 500 orders/minute; Event processing latency under 1 second
